traits.name: Tunneler
entries: The aurumvorax can burrow through solid rock and metal at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The aurumvorax makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage. If the target is a creature wearing armor of any type, the aurumvorax regains 4 ({@dice 1d6 + 1}) hit points.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the aurumvorax can't use its Claw attack on another target, and when it moves, it can drag the {@condition grappled} creature with it, without the aurumvorax's speed being halved.
